title: Does Battle Boss Malzahar reference a particular game? If so, which one?
body: Battle Boss Brand references Mega Man, Battle Boss Ziggs references Bomberman; I only thought it would make sense that the third would follow suit. However, I can't seem to pinpoint any reference to a particular game. Any and all help is greatly appreciated.

replies.body: VFX wise i was inspired by old vector games.  played/studied Astroids, Tempest, Battlezone, Trail gunner ...etc. And then of course watched a bunch of cheesy 80s movies to get into the "hacker" vibe. all of that + a little wreck it ralph was it for me at least.

> [{quoted}](name=iZac,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=kZKl7tWi,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2017-07-30T03:29:11.383+0000)
>
> VFX wise i was inspired by old vector games.  played/studied Astroids, Tempest, Battlezone, Trail gunner ...etc. And then of course watched a bunch of cheesy 80s movies to get into the "hacker" vibe. all of that + a little wreck it ralph was it for me at least.

i think the vector style is a good way to distinguish battle boss from the normal arcade skins, i want you to focus on it in the future.
Oh wow, didn't expect a rioter to answer, but thanks a lot! {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

Early on we were joking about Malzahar's ultimate making you play Virtual Boy and then throwing up on yourself. This is the hell that he can show you:
 https://youtu.be/KyLpQFCAkQo
Woah... his E really does show you a vision of your own demise...{{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}
BB Malzahar refers to Tempest 2000. The exact names for other references aren't coming to me right now, but I do know them.

I get a virus vibe from him. Like the voidlings are viruses and malzahar is infecting the game with them. I don't know if he's inspired from any games but being a virus spreader could be his theme. (and no game has intentional viruses that I can think of)
All of his abilities remind me of Tempest and Geometry wars, but I don't know who they designed him after
His splash art reminds me of Star Fox.
Tbh he reminds me a bit of Evangelion unit-01
